entries.name: camel_case(str)
entries.desc: Receives a string and convert it to camel case. ::camel_case returns CamelCase.

entries.name: escape_globs(path)
entries.desc: Returns a string that has had any glob characters escaped. The glob characters are `* ? { } [ ]`.

entries.name: escape_html(string)
entries.desc: Returns a string that has had any HTML characters escaped.

entries.name: find_by_namespace(namespace)
entries.desc: Receives a namespace and search for it in the Bundler::Thor::Base subclasses.

entries.name: find_class_and_command_by_namespace(namespace, fallback = true)
entries.desc: Receives a namespace and tries to retrieve a Bundler::Thor or Bundler::Thor::Group class from it. It first searches for a class using the all the given namespace, if it's not found, removes the highest entry and searches for the class again. If found, returns the highest entry as the class name.

entries.name: globs_for(path)
entries.desc: Where to look for Bundler::Thor files.

entries.name: load_thorfile(path, content = nil, debug = false)
entries.desc: Receives a path and load the thor file in the path. The file is evaluated inside the sandbox to avoid namespacing conflicts.

entries.name: namespace_from_thor_class(constant)
entries.desc: Receives a constant and converts it to a Bundler::Thor namespace. Since Bundler::Thor commands can be added to a sandbox, this method is also responsible for removing the sandbox namespace.

entries.name: namespaces_in_content(contents, file = __FILE__)
entries.desc: Given the contents, evaluate it inside the sandbox and returns the namespaces defined in the sandbox.

entries.name: ruby_command()
entries.desc: Return the path to the ruby interpreter taking into account multiple installations and windows extensions.

entries.name: snake_case(str)
entries.desc: Receives a string and convert it to snake case. SnakeCase returns snake_case.

entries.name: thor_classes_in(klass)
entries.desc: Returns the thor classes declared inside the given class.

entries.name: thor_root()
entries.desc: Returns the root where thor files are located, depending on the OS.
